channel.title: xml on Development Cheat Sheets
channel.description: Recent content in xml on Development Cheat Sheets

item.title: Marshalling XML in SpringBoot
item.description: This page contains information, syntax, and simple code examples, about un/marshalling XML in SpringBoot.

item.title: SOAP
item.description: Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) is a messaging protocol specification for exchanging structured information in the implementation of web services in computer networks.

item.title: WSDL
item.description: WSDL is an XML notation for describing a web service.

item.title: XPath
item.description: XPath is an expression language designed to support the query or transformation of XML documents.
